segments.text: I observe the kitchen layout, with the sink on the right and cabinets opposite.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman faces left, holding a plate wrapped in a dish towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Faucet water fills the sink and spills over the edge steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle accumulates on the floor beneath the lower cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy stands on a two-step stool in front of the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He reaches with one hand into the labeled cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His other hand grips a plate, perhaps to steady himself.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts slightly backward, showing instability.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl stands nearby, arm extended toward the jar expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains frame the window, revealing a neat garden path outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes are stacked on the counter to the woman's right.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene blends routine chores with children's quiet activity.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light from the window illuminates the domestic details clearly.
segments.speaker: PAR
